name: api-m77-raspberry-wifi-node
description: API to interact with the functionality of the m77-raspberry-wifi-node module

scripts.dev:pm2: PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=development pm2 start src/index.js --name api -i 2 --watch true --restart-delay 10 --max-restarts 20 && pm2 save
scripts.start:pm2: PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=production pm2 start src/index.js --name api -i 2  --restart-delay 10 --max-restarts 20 && pm2 save

author: Ing. Carlos Yerena - mangos77
